pageContext.Title: Javascript Beyond the Browser - Electron
pageContext.Description: Javascript is a great programming language to create interactive web applications, but it can also be used to create other kinds of software, such as apps for the Desktop. Electron is a framework that helps you do that. In this Guide you will explore this tool and learn a bit more about the possibilities of Javascript.

Skills.Skill: Be able to create a Desktop application with Javascript

pageContext.topicsList:
• Electron
    • What is Electron?
      • Examples of apps created with Electron
    • Setup & Dev Environment
    • Debugging
    • Rendering
    • Interaction
    • Storage
    • Notifications
    • Deployment

actionPoints.actionPoint: Take on a crash course about ElectronJS
